title: Notifications
alt: It's 10:34 PM for this user. They really need to get going, they have a thing early tomorrow. Are you sure you want to notify?
transcript:
[White Hat, Megan and Cueball are standing next to each other. White Hat is separated from the other two figures by a small margin.]
White Hat: And another thing that annoys me about people is...
Cueball: This user has notifications turned off.[The camera zooms in on Megan and Cueball. Megan turns to look at Cueball.]
Cueball: They will see your messages when they're back. 
Cueball: Notify anyway?[The camera zooms outward to show White Hat. All three figures are silently standing.][Megan turns to look at Cueball again.]
Megan: What are you--
Cueball: Shhh- It's working.
